text: Now his doom is sealed irrevocably, and he has given himself up to despair.
transcription_expl: nˈaʊː hˈɪz dˈuˑm ˈɪ˘z s˘ˈild ˌɪrˈɛv˘əkəbliˑ, ən˘dˑ hˈi˘ hˈæ˘z ɡˈɪv˘ən hɪˑm˘sˈɛ˘l˘f˘ ˈʌˑp tˈu dɪspˈɛrː.
transcription_impl: nˈaʊ hˈɪz dˈum ˈɪz sˈild ˌɪrˈɛvəkəbli, ənd hˈi hˈæz ɡˈɪvən hɪmsˈɛlf ˈʌp tˈu dɪspˈɛr.
